title: Commerce Events
description: Commerce events used to capture occurrences of events that frequently occur in the shopping cart as customers interact with Product pages and purchase flows. These events are meant to be used in conjunction with the Order Info and Product variable groups

xdm:billingInfoAdd.title: Billing Info Add
xdm:billingInfoAdd.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user adds billing information

xdm:billingInfoRemove.title: Billing Info Remove
xdm:billingInfoRemove.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user removes billing information

xdm:cartAbandon.title: Cart Abandon
xdm:cartAbandon.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user abandons a shopping cart after adding items to it. Cart Reopen should be used to indicate a user has returned and resumed adding items to the shopping cart

xdm:cartAdd.title: Cart Add
xdm:cartAdd.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user adds an item or items to the shopping cart

xdm:cartAddQuantity.title: Cart Add Quantity
xdm:cartAddQuantity.description: Measure of the number of items added to the shopping cart

xdm:cartOpen.title: Cart Open
xdm:cartOpen.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user opens a new shopping cart

xdm:cartRemove.title: Cart Remove
xdm:cartRemove.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user removes an item or items from the Shopping Cart

xdm:cartRemoveQuantity.title: Cart Remove Quantity
xdm:cartRemoveQuantity.description: Measure of the number of items removed from the shopping cart

xdm:cartReopen.title: Cart Reopen
xdm:cartReopen.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user reopens a shopping cart after a cart abandon has occurred

xdm:cartTotalValue.title: Cart Total Value
xdm:cartTotalValue.description: Measure of the total cart value

xdm:cartTotalItems.title: Cart Total Items
xdm:cartTotalItems.description: Measure of the number of items in the shopping cart

xdm:cartView.title: Cart View
xdm:cartView.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user views the shopping cart

xdm:checkoutStart.title: Checkout Start
xdm:checkoutStart.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user begins the checkout process

xdm:checkoutComplete.title: Checkout Complete
xdm:checkoutComplete.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user completes the checkout process

xdm:checkoutStep.title: Checkout Step
xdm:checkoutStep.description: A value used to capture the current step checkout process

xdm:configureProduct.title: Configure Product
xdm:configureProduct.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user configures the various facets (size, color, finish) of a product

xdm:couponAdd.title: Coupon Add
xdm:couponAdd.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user adds a coupon during the checkout process. If recording coupon codes or values, they should be captured in Order Info in the Coupons Array

xdm:couponRemove.title: Coupon Remove
xdm:couponRemove.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user removes a coupon during the checkout process. If recording coupon codes or values, they should be captured in Order Info in the Coupons Array

xdm:discountAdd.title: Discount Add
xdm:discountAdd.description: Measure of the occurrences when a non-coupon discount is applied to an order. If recording discount codes or values, they should be captured in Order Info in the Discounts Array

xdm:discountRemove.title: Discount Remove
xdm:discountRemove.description: Measure of the occurrences when a non-coupon discount is removed from an order. If recording discount codes or values, they should be captured in Order Info in the Discounts Array

xdm:giftCardAdd.title: Gift Card Add
xdm:giftCardAdd.description: Measure of the occurrences when a gift card is added to an order

xdm:giftCardRemove.title: Gift Card Remove
xdm:giftCardRemove.description: Measure of the occurrences when a gift card is removed from an order

xdm:giftMessageSelected.title: Gift Message Selected
xdm:giftMessageSelected.description: Measure of the occurrences when a gift message is added to an order

xdm:giftWrappingSelected.title: Gift Wrapping Selected
xdm:giftWrappingSelected.description: Measure of the occurrences when gift wrapping is added to an order

xdm:inStorePurchase.title: In-store Purchase
xdm:inStorePurchase.description: Measure of the occurrences when a purchase is made in-store

xdm:imageSelect.title: Image Select
xdm:imageSelect.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user clicks on a product image in order to view increased detail when browsing products on the site

xdm:oneClickCheckout.title: One Click Checkout
xdm:oneClickCheckout.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user opts to use a one click checkout option

xdm:oneClickPay.title: One Click
xdm:oneClickPay.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user opts to use a one click payment option

xdm:orderReview.title: Order Review
xdm:orderReview.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user reviews an order during the checkout process

xdm:quickView.title: Quick View
xdm:quickView.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user utilizes a quick product view function on the site. This value would be used to distinguish quick product views which may not include navigating away from the product listing page and product views which involve a load of the product page

xdm:paymentMethodAdd.title: Payment Method Add
xdm:paymentMethodAdd.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user adds a payment method during the checkout process or in account management

xdm:paymentMethodRemove.title: Payment Method Remove
xdm:paymentMethodRemove.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user removes a payment method during the checkout process or in account management

xdm:productListPageView.title: Product List Page View
xdm:productListPageView.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user views a product list page

xdm:productQuantityEdit.title: Product Quantity Edit
xdm:productQuantityEdit.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user edits the quantity of an item in the shopping cart

xdm:productView.title: Product View
xdm:productView.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user views a product page

xdm:promoCodeAdd.title: Promo Code Add
xdm:promoCodeAdd.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user adds a promo code during the checkout process. If recording promo codes or values, they should be captured in Order Info in the Promo Codes Array

xdm:promoCodeRemove.title: Promo Code Remove
xdm:promoCodeRemove.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user removes a promo code during the checkout process. If recording promo codes or values, they should be captured in Order Info in the Promo Codes Array

xdm:purchase.title: Purchase
xdm:purchase.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user completes a purchase

xdm:reorder.title: Reorder
xdm:reorder.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user completes a reorder of a previous purchase

xdm:saveForLaterAdd.title: Save For Later Add
xdm:saveForLaterAdd.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user adds an item to their Save For Later list

xdm:saveForLaterRemove.title: Save For Later Remove
xdm:saveForLaterRemove.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user removes an item from their Save For Later list

xdm:saveForLaterMoveToCart.title: Save For Later Move to Cart
xdm:saveForLaterMoveToCart.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user moves an item from their Save For Later list to the shopping cart

xdm:saveForLaterView.title: Save For Later View
xdm:saveForLaterView.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user views the Save For Later list

xdm:shipBOPIS.title: Buy Online Pickup in Store
xdm:shipBOPIS.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user purchases an item and picks it up in a local store

xdm:shipBOSS.title: Buy Online Ship to Store
xdm:shipBOSS.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user purchases an item and ships it to a local store

xdm:shipHome.title: Buy Online Ship Home
xdm:shipHome.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user purchases an item and ships it to their home

xdm:splitPaymentMethods.title: Split Payment Methods
xdm:splitPaymentMethods.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user splits payment methods when making a purchase

xdm:wishListAdd.title: Wishlist Add
xdm:wishListAdd.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user moves an item from their Shopping Cart to a Wishlist

xdm:wishListRemove.title: Wishlist Remove
xdm:wishListRemove.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user deletes an item from their Wishlist

xdm:wishListMoveToCart.title: Wishlist Move to Cart
xdm:wishListMoveToCart.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user moves an item from their Wishlist to the shopping cart

xdm:wishListView.title: Wishlist View
xdm:wishListView.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user views the Wishlist

xdm:wishListSave.title: Wishlist Save
xdm:wishListSave.description: Measure of the occurrences when a user saves their Wishlist
